title: Othakada Lyrics Pandiya Nadu Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Hariharasudhan & Sooraj Santhosh
Movie: Pandiya nadu
Muisc: D Imman
Lyrics: Vairamuthu		 .

Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Othakada Othakada Machaan
ivan otha kanna oruthimela vachaan
ava pichikittu pichikitu ponaa
ivan pithukuli pithukulil aanaan

jeyichaa jodi varum
thorthaa dhaadi varum
ithaan machaan love-u
idhil ennaathuku javvu

Jeyichaa maala maathu
thorthaa aala maathu
ithaan machaan love-u
ithil enaathuku javvu

Jeyichaaa thaali kayiru..
machi thothaa thooku kayiru

Othakada Othakada Machaan
ivan otha kanna oruthimela vachaan
ava pichikittu pichikitu ponaa
ivan pithukuli pithukulil aanaan

Kanna kaati vala virukkum
kanna katti kazhutharukkum
otha urava kooti vandhu
motha urava kondu pudum

ithaan machaan love-u
idhil ennaathuku javvu
cell phone-uku selaviluthu
selvamellaam karachipudum
anji nimisham sogam koduthu
aayul mulukka azhuga vidum

Jeyichaaa thaali kayiru..
machi thothaa thooku kayiru
..
Othakada Othakada Machaan
naan otha kanna oruthimela vachen
odi ponaa odiponaa penne
ippa othukida othukida vachen

jeyichaa inbam varum
thothaa gnanam varum
ithaan machaan love
idhu ilaa vazhak javvu

Aeliyum puli adikkum
puluvum padamedukkum
ithaan machaan love
idhu ilaa vazhak javvu

Naarum poo aagumdaa
machi more-um bear aagumdaa
verum Naarum poo aagumdaa
machi more-um bear aagumdaa English Translation
I tried my best :)
